Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Lutetium Lu 177-dotatate is approved to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Gastroenteropancreatic neuroendocrine tumors. It is used in adults and children aged 12 years and older whose cancer is somatostatin receptor positive.

Section.Para: Lutetium Lu 177-dotatate is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
